title: Looking for a font
content:
Dear Typophilists,

I'm looking for a font that I used for a book title long time ago. Can you help me to find it?

Steffen Kawelke

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417045209im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Hintert%C3%BCr%20W%C3%B6rding_5640.jpg)
author: Brunos Designer

comments.content:
Nobody saw this post because it's in a completely wrong place. It should be in the Type ID forum.  
However, the font is

[LHF Billhead](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417045209/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/letterheadfonts/lhf-billhead-1890/)

- Herb

Dear Herb,  
you saved the project. Thank you. It was an emergency...  
Next time I look for the right forum.

Greetings from Berlin
